```{r reading data, include=FALSE}
  "ีีธึีถีพีกึ", "ีีฅีฟึีพีกึ", "ีีกึีฟ", "ิฑีบึีซีฌ", "ีีกีตีซีฝ", "ีีธึีถีซีฝ", "ีีธึีฌีซีฝ",
  "ีีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝ", "ีีฅีบีฟีฅีดีขีฅึ", "ีีธีฏีฟีฅีดีขีฅึ", "ีีธีตีฅีดีขีฅึ", "ิดีฅีฏีฟีฅีดีขีฅึ"
```

```{r, include=FALSE}

loans_by_branches <- 
  loans_by_branches_row  |> 
  rename(sphere = 1, temp = 2) |> 
  mutate(
    task = ifelse(grepl("ีี ีกีผึีฟึีกีตีซีถ", sphere), sphere, NA),
    task = str_remove_all(task, "ีี ีกีผึีฟึีกีตีซีถ ีขีกีถีฏีฅึีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ีผีฅีฆีซีคีฅีถีฟีถีฅึีซีถ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีกีฎ *"),
    task = str_remove_all(task, "ีถ ีจีฝีฟ ีธีฌีธึีฟีถีฅึีซ ?1,2")
  ) |> 
  relocate(task) |> 
  fill(task, .direction = "down") |>
  filter(
    !is.na(temp) |
      sphere %in% c("ีีบีกีฝีกึีฏีดีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟ", "ีีบีกีผีธีฒีกีฏีกีถ ีพีกึีฏีฅึ", "ีีซีบีธีฉีฅึีกีตีซีถ ีพีกึีฏีฅึ", "ิฑีตีฌ")
  ) |>
  t() |>  as_tibble(header = TRUE) |>
  fill(V1, .direction = "down") |>
  mutate(date = paste(V2, V1)) |> 
  relocate(date) |> 
  t() |>  as_tibble(header = TRUE) |> 
  row_to_names(row_number = 1) |> 
  rename(bank_loans = 1, sphere = 2) |> 
  filter(!grepl("ีฌีธึีฟ", sphere), !is.na(sphere)) |>
  pivot_longer(-c(bank_loans, sphere), names_to = "date", values_to = "dram") |> 
  extract(date, into = c("month_name", "year"), regex = "(.*) (\\d{4})") |> 
  mutate(
    month = c(1:12)[match(month_name, arm_month_names)],
    date = ym(paste(year, month)),
    date = date + months(1) - days(1),
    dram = as.numeric(dram),
    sphere = fct_inorder(sphere),
    bank_loans = fct_inorder(bank_loans)
  ) |> 
  filter(sphere != "ิธีถีคีกีดีฅีถีจ") |> 
  relocate(-dram) |> 
  group_by(date, bank_loans) |> 
  mutate(pct_dram = dram / sum(dram)) |> 
  ungroup()

loans_by_branches |> 
  write_csv("loans_by_branches_clean.csv")

```

```{r, include=FALSE}
loans_by_banks <- read_excel("7_loans_by_branches_arm.xlsx", sheet = 2, skip = 1)
loans_by_credit <- read_excel("7_loans_by_branches_arm.xlsx", sheet = 3, skip = 1)



loans_by_banks_clean <- 
  loans_by_banks |> 
   rename(indicator = 1, temp = 2) |> 
  filter(!is.na(temp)) |> 
  mutate(
    indicator = str_trim(indicator),
    indicator = ifelse(grepl("^K.\\d", indicator), paste(row_number(), indicator), indicator)
  ) |>
  t() |> as.tibble() |> 
  mutate(
    V1 = ifelse(row_number() == 1, "date", V1),
    V2 = ifelse(row_number() == 1, "FX", V2)
  ) |> 
  janitor::row_to_names(row_number = 1) |> 
  fill(date, .direction = "down") |> 
  extract(
    date, into = c("month", "year"), regex = "([ีก-ึิฑ-ี]+)[\\s\\t-]+(\\d{2,4}.?)",
    remove = FALSE, convert = TRUE
  ) |> 
  relocate(month, year) |> 
  mutate(
    year = ifelse(year < 100, 2000 + year, year)
  ) |> 
  mutate(
    month = c(1:12)[match(month, arm_month_names)],
    date = ym(paste(year, month))
  ) |> 
  pivot_longer(-c(date, year, month, FX), names_to = "indicator") |> 
  mutate(
    value = parse_number(value)
  )

loans_by_banks_clean |> write_csv("loans_by_banks_clean.csv")
```

ิฑีผีกีปีซีถ ีฃีฎีกีบีกีฟีฏีฅึีธึีด ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีพีกีฎ ีง ีกีผึีฟึีกีตีซีถ ีขีกีถีฏีฅึีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีกีฎ ีพีกึีฏีฅึีจ\` ีจีฝีฟ ีธีฌีธึีฟีถีฅึีซึ ิปีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีฅึึีธึีด ีง, ีกึีคีตีธึีถีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟีซีถ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีธีฒ ีกึีฟีกึีชีธึีตีฉีธีพ ีพีกึีฏีฅึีจ 2021 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซึ ีธึีถีฅีถ ีกีถีฏีดีกีถ ีดีซีฟีธึีดึ 2020 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีคีฅีฏีฟีฅีดีขีฅึีซีถ ีกึีคีตีธึีถีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟีซีถ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีฅีฌ ีงึ 484 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีดีซีถ ีฐีกีดีกึีชีฅึ ีกึีฟีกึีชีธึีตีฉีธีพ ีพีกึีฏ, 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีกีบึีซีฌีซีถ\` ีกึีคีฅีถ 255 ีดีฌึีค ีคึีกีดึ ิฑีตีฝ ีทึีปีกีถีธึีด ีกีถีฏีธึีดีจ ีฏีกีฆีดีฅีฌ ีง 47 ีฟีธีฏีธีฝึ ิฑีตีฝ ีธีฌีธึีฟีซีถ ีี ีคึีกีดีธีพ ีฟึีกีดีกีคึีพีกีฎ ีพีกึีฏีฅึีจ ีถีธึีตีถีบีฅีฝ ีธึีถีฅีถ ีกีถีฏีดีกีถ ีดีซีฟีธึีด, ีธึีจ ีฝีฏีฝีฅีฌ ีง 2023 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซ ีฝีฏีฆีขีซึึ ิฑีตีฝ ีฐีกีถีฃีกีดีกีถึีจ ีพีฏีกีตีธึีด ีง ีถึีก ีดีกีฝีซีถ, ีธึ ีซึีกีฏีกีถ ีกึีคีตีธึีถีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีกีตีฝ ีบีกีฐีซีถ ีถีพีกีฆีธึีด ีงึ ิถีกึีฐีธึึีฅีฌีซีถ ีกีตีถ ีง, ีธึ ีีิฑ-ีซ ีกีณีซ ึ ีฟีถีฟีฅีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีกีฏีฟีซีพีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีซีดีถีกีฏีกีถ ีกีณีจ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีทึีปีกีถีธึีด ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีฅีฌ ีง ีฐีฅีถึ ีกึีตีธึีถีกีขีฅึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ, ีธึีซ ีดีฅีฎ ีดีกีฝีจ ีบีกีทีฟีธีถีกีบีฅีฝ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีพีธึีพีกีฎ ีง ีธีฝีฏีธึ ีกึีฟีกีคึีธึีฉีตีกีดีข, ีธึีจ ีฉีกีถีฏีกึีชีฅึ ึ ีฏีซีฝีกีฉีกีถีฏีกึีชีฅึ ึีกึีฅึีซ ึ ีดีฅีฟีกีฒีถีฅึีซ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีกีดีฝีซีถีฅึีซีถ ีฃึีกีถึีกีฎ ีฆีฃีกีฌีซ ีพีฅึีกีกึีฟีกีฐีกีถีดีกีถ ีกึีคีตีธึีถึีถ ีงึ

## English Summary

### ๐น๐๐ฆ Under the Loan. Lending trends by industry

This newsletter outlines a concerning trend in the decline of foreign currency loans to the industrial sector, indicating a contraction in real industry. Economic growth, however, has been primarily boosted by the re-export of precious metals, notably gold, highlighting a dependency on external factors. Despite a decrease in foreign currency loans to the trade sector, there's a positive offset with an increase in Armenian dram loans, particularly noticeable in agriculture and construction sectors.

On the other hand, there's a worrying increase in mortgage and consumer loans, with mortgage loans surpassing 10 percent of GDP by April 2024, compared to just 2.5 percent in 2018. This shift in lending patterns is reflected in a decrease in the share of industry and trade loans, while consumer and mortgage loans now dominate over half of all loans. These trends raise concerns regarding economic stability, especially considering the downward trend in overall lending and economic contraction indicators, suggesting a potential overreliance on unsustainable factors like gold re-exports for economic growth.
